TITLE: Pennsylvania Supreme Court rules mail ballots with incorrect dates won't be counted

TITLE: Georgia Lt. Gov. Burt Jones won’t face charges in 2020 election interference case

SUMMARY: The former president later tried to create some distance with Loomer, saying in a Truth Social post "I disagree with the statements she made," without specifying which remarks

TITLE: Nebraska Supreme Court allows competing abortion measures on November ballot
SUMMARY: Nebraska law prohibits abortion after 12 weeks, with some exceptions. One measure would effectively undo that law, while the other would codify it in the state’s constitution

TITLE: Bomb threats force second consecutive day of school closures in Springfield, Ohio
SUMMARY: Several local leaders have also been targeted in the wake of baseless claims aimed at Haitian immigrants that have been repeated by former President Donald Trump

SUMMARY: Former President Donald Trump addressed the media in California ahead of a rally tonight in Las Vegas

SUMMARY: Even though it is already illegal and rare, eight states put constitutional amendments designed to prevent noncitizens from voting on this fall’s ballot

SUMMARY: The Harris campaign is especially focused on reaching undecided Latino voters who may be persuaded by parts of former President Donald Trump’s economic message

TITLE: RFK Jr. says he is being investigated for collecting whale specimen

SUMMARY: Warren Jones Crazybull made at least nine threatening phone calls to the former president's residence, prosecutors said in court documents

SUMMARY: The leader of the Haitian Bridge Alliance filed the criminal charges over false claims the former president and his running mate made about Haitian immigrants' eating local pets

SUMMARY: The Senate sent legislation to the White House that would provide Trump and Harris the same level of protection as President Joe Biden
